<h5>Checking For At-most Three Unique Values In Column</h5>

```{r echo=TRUE}
length(unique(data$marital)) #= 3
```

<h5>Checking For Spaces</h5>

```{r echo=TRUE}
sum(data$marital == "")
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<h5>Checking For Null Values</h5>
```{r echo=TRUE}
sum(is.na(data$marital))
```
